languages.text: "Милосердная Иша... Лишь настоящее чудовище способно на подобное зверство".
"Gracious Isha... Only a true monster is capable of such an atrocity."
languages.original_text: "Милосердная Иша... Лишь настоящее чудовище способно на подобное зверство".

traits.locale_text: "Gracious Isha... Only a true monster is capable of such an atrocity."

languages.text: “爱莎在上……只有真正的禽兽，才会犯下这样的暴行。”
languages.original_text: "Gracious Isha... Only a true monster is capable of such an atrocity."

traits.locale_text: “爱莎在上……只有真正的禽兽，才会犯下这样的暴行。”

languages.text: "Gütige Isha ... Nur ein wahres Monster ist zu einer solchen Gräueltat fähig."
languages.original_text: "Gracious Isha... Only a true monster is capable of such an atrocity."

traits.locale_text: "Gütige Isha ... Nur ein wahres Monster ist zu einer solchen Gräueltat fähig."

languages.text: «Oh, piadosa Isha... Solo un auténtico monstruo es capaz de cometer una atrocidad semejante».
languages.original_text: "Gracious Isha... Only a true monster is capable of such an atrocity."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, piadosa Isha... Solo un auténtico monstruo es capaz de cometer una atrocidad semejante».

languages.text: « Par la grâce d'Isha... Seul un véritable monstre est capable de telles atrocités. »
languages.original_text: "Gracious Isha... Only a true monster is capable of such an atrocity."

traits.locale_text: « Par la grâce d'Isha... Seul un véritable monstre est capable de telles atrocités. »

languages.text: 「優雅なイシャ…このような残虐行為ができるのは真の怪物だけだ」
languages.original_text: "Gracious Isha... Only a true monster is capable of such an atrocity."

traits.locale_text: 「優雅なイシャ…このような残虐行為ができるのは真の怪物だけだ」

languages.text: "Merhametli İşa... Böylesi bir gaddarlık, ancak gerçek bir canavarın elinden çıkabilir."
languages.original_text: "Gracious Isha... Only a true monster is capable of such an atrocity."

traits.locale_text: "Merhametli İşa... Böylesi bir gaddarlık, ancak gerçek bir canavarın elinden çıkabilir."
